Several items (1 and 19-20) are out of place.
* 2.01 (Titan on the Tracks) is 3.01 (The Widow's Son in the Windshield)
* 2.19 (Bones.2x19.Player Under Pressure.avi) is (2.19 - Spaceman in a Crater)
* 2.20 (Bones.2x20.Spaceman In A Crater.avi) is (2.20 The Glowing Bones in 'The Old Stone House')
* 2.21 (Bones.2x21.The Glowing Bones In The Old Stone House.avi) is (2.21Stargazer In A Puddle)
* 2.22 (Bones.2x22.Stargazer In A Puddle.avi) is  (2.21Stargazer In A Puddle)
